description:
Part of the [Snap Range][], Ryan McKibbin's smart and versatile Snap Table features clever use of plywood's natural flexibility to create snap-together, interlocking joints for easy tools-free assembly and disassembly. Made out of just six parts, it can be snapped together in a few moments.

Ideal for use in the home or office, the table is a perfect compliment to the [Snap Bench][] and [Snap Chair][], both of which can provide suitable seating and be matched to complete a work or dining arrangement.

[Snap Range]: /snap
[Snap Bench]: /snap/snap-bench
[Snap Chair]: /snap/snap-chair
name: Snap Table
